data: Always enwrapped in the illusory mists, always touching the evasive clouds, the peaks of the Great Smoky Mountains are like some barren ideal, that has bartered for the vague isolations of a higher atmosphere the material values of the warm world below.
The Prophet of the Great Smoky Mountains
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: american literature
